headline: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX) Registers a Bigger Fall Than the Market: Important Facts to Note
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX) stood at $449.52, denoting a -1.2% move from the preceding trading day.
